column3: Set glass baseline correction settings of the current sample as default. Default settings are applied to newly imported spectra
Restore the original |silich2o| default settings for baseline correction of glasses. |silich2o| default settings were designed for basaltic glasses
Set interference baseline correction settings of the current sample as default. Default settings are applied to newly imported interference spectra
Restore the original |silich2o| default settings for baseline correction of interference. |silich2o| default settings were designed for olivine
